name: Sea Rivals VR
description:
Become a true sea wolf, defeat enemy fleets, and use your cunning to prevail.
Immerse yourself in an exciting VR project inspired by classic seabattle arcade games!



Sea Rivals VR features:

  • Launch torpedoes using a big red button (yes, just like in the movies!)
  • Complete dozens of intense missions
  • Appreciate the submarine’s interior, based on real ships like the USS PAMPANITO, HMAS OVENS SUBMARINE, and others!
  • Use periscopes and radar to gain an advantage in battle
  • Dive underwater to save yourself and your submarine!
